targets.expr: sum by(alertname, startsAt, endsAt, fingerprint) (count_over_time({alert_status="resolved"} |= `$content_filter` | json endsAt="alert.endsAt", startsAt="alert.startsAt", alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint" [$__range]))

sum(count_over_time({alert_status="firing"} |= "$content_filter" | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__range])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt, severity)

count(sum(count_over_time({alert_status="firing"} |= "$content_filter"  | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__range])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt, priority)) by (priority)

count(sum(count_over_time({alert_status="firing"} |= "$content_filter" | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__range])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt))

count (sum(count_over_time({alert_status="firing"} |= "$content_filter" | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__range])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt, severity)) by (severity)

count(sum by(alertname, startsAt, fingerprint) (count_over_time({alert_status="resolved"} |= `$content_filter` | json startsAt="alert.startsAt", alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint" [$__range])))

count(sum by(alertname, startsAt, fingerprint, severity) (count_over_time({alert_status="resolved"} |= `$content_filter` | json startsAt="alert.startsAt", alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint" [$__range]))) by (severity)

count(sum(count_over_time({alert_status="firing"} |= "$content_filter" | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__auto])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt, severity)) by (severity)

count(sum(count_over_time({alert_status="resolved"} |= "$content_filter" | json alertname="alert.labels.alertname", fingerprint="alert.fingerprint", startsAt="alert.startsAt" [$__auto])) by (alertname, fingerprint, startsAt, severity)) by (severity)
